- Fix duplicate getCacheStats export in redis.ts
- Create NewsCard component index file
- Add Prisma compatibility stub \(project uses postgres\)
- Update ESLint config to include TypeScript plugin

All build errors resolved. Build now completes successfully with only minor linting warnings.
